text: I touched the door handle. I need to wash my hands NOW.
Please don't tell me it's fine. That makes it worse.
Help me sit with this feeling for 2 minutes.
The anxiety is so high. I feel sick.
Can you time me for 2 minutes while I don't wash?
OCD is screaming at me. But I know it lies.
What do I say to myself instead of washing?
The urge is dropping slightly. Still there though.
I did it. I didn't wash. It was awful but I did it.
Save: 2-minute delay + coping statement + timer helped.
